verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: at urban schools conference] [ARG0: teachers] [V: get] [ARG1: a lesson in empathy the way jeff duncan - andrade sees it teaching was never meant to be a tidy profession there always are students in turmoil and a big part of the job especially in urban schools is to deal with the underlying conditions that students may be dealing with whether it a home with drug addiction a lack of basics like decent food and clothing and just as importantly a poor self - image if you resent the mess get an office job he told] the hundreds of capital region teachers who gathered to hear him tuesday during an urban schools conference at the empire state plaza superintendent san francisco state university capital region boces james moffet adam julian alvarez oakland schenectady kansas school principal empire state plaza schenectady school district capital region menands associate professor jeff duncan andrade calif ireland urban schools urban schools conference jeff duncan - andrade feely cathryn hunt abraham maslow wichita lansingburgh school teacher larry spring schenectady new york

at urban schools conference teachers get a lesson in empathy the way jeff [ARG0: duncan] - [V: andrade] sees it teaching was never meant to be a tidy profession there always are students in turmoil and a big part of the job especially in urban schools is to deal with the underlying conditions that students may be dealing with whether it a home with drug addiction a lack of basics like decent food and clothing and just as importantly a poor self - image if you resent the mess get an office job he told the hundreds of capital region teachers who gathered to hear him tuesday during an urban schools conference at the empire state plaza superintendent san francisco state university capital region boces james moffet adam julian alvarez oakland schenectady kansas school principal empire state plaza schenectady school district capital region menands associate professor jeff duncan andrade calif ireland urban schools urban schools conference jeff duncan - andrade feely cathryn hunt abraham maslow wichita lansingburgh school teacher larry spring schenectady new york
